name: Garden Symphony (bunnyUFO, gabrielchez, Adrian Hanson, dizzyandlost, slipperyfox)
name_original: Garden Symphony (bunnyUFO, gabrielchez, Adrian Hanson, dizzyandlost, slipperyfox)
description:
Garden Symphony

Join our friend Wrenford as he goes on a journey to heal the Mother Tree!
You will discover a world of plants enchanted by music.

Controls

Gamepad Recommended!

Controls:     PS4 Gamepad    Mouse and Keyboard

Move:          LS                          WASD
Look:           RS                          Mouse 
Jump:           X                         Space Bar
Dash:           O                 Right Click or Shift
Hover:         ⧠                           Left Click

bunnyufo:
Rhythm Events, Procedural Spline Meshes, Optimizations, and Player Animations

slipperyfox:
Character, Gameplay, and UI Programming

gabrielchez:
Composer, SFX, Gameplay QA, and Official Chirp Arranger
